name: Geekie API Explorer
description: Chrome App for easily interacting with Geekie APIs
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src *; script-src 'self' https://code.jquery.com/ https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/ https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src *; font-src *; child-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ https://geekie.s3.amazonaws.com/;
